scripts.build: npm run build:dto; npm run build:v1.0; npm run build:v1.1; npm run build:thirdparty
scripts.build:v1.0: swagger-cli bundle -t yaml -o docs/fspiop-rest-v1.0-openapi3-snippets.yaml v1.0/openapi3/index.yaml && swagger-cli validate docs/fspiop-rest-v1.0-openapi3-snippets.yaml
scripts.build:v1.1: swagger-cli bundle -t yaml -o docs/fspiop-rest-v1.1-openapi3-snippets.yaml v1.1/openapi3/index.yaml && swagger-cli validate docs/fspiop-rest-v1.1-openapi3-snippets.yaml
scripts.build:thirdparty: swagger-cli bundle -t yaml -o docs/thirdparty-openapi3-snippets.yaml thirdparty/openapi3/index.yaml && swagger-cli validate docs/thirdparty-openapi3-snippets.yaml
